name: css-selector-extract

scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:bundle && npm run scripts:lint

0.1.0.name: css-selector-extract
0.1.0.description: With selector extracting, it is possible to extract only certain CSS selectors form (S)CSS code. This is especially useful if you want to extract only a few CSS classes from a huge library or framework.
